checklist.Text: Incubate samples with a mild rotation at 60 degrees celsius for 30 minutes
Remove Picogreen kit from -4 degrees celsius freezer, loosen cover
Let kit contents equilibriate at room temperature for 20 minutes
Swab work area with nucleic acid deconataminate
Pipette 19.9mL of component B into foil wrapped tube
Pipette 100 uL of concentrated Picogreen reagent into the foil wrapped tube
Tear off a piece of foil sufficient to cover 96-well plate
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A1-H1
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A2-H2
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A3-H3
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A4-H4
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A5-H5
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A6-H6
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A7-H7
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A8-H8
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A9-H9
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A10-H10
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A11-H11
pipette from Picogreen Mix into A12-H12
Place tubes in 5 X 10 tube rack on benchtop
Add 5 uL of samples 1-8 to wells 3A through 3H
Add 5 uL of samples 9-16 to wells 4A through 4H
